Authors: Khalil A.-A., Reza A., Junaedi P.A., Kanigoro B.
Title: Data Visualization Application for Analyzing Public Company Financial Statement
Affiliations: Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; IT Practitioner, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Khalil, A.-A., Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Reza, A., Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Junaedi, P.A., IT Practitioner, Jakarta, Indonesia; Kanigoro, B., Computer Science Program, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: The purpose of the research was to develop a visualization application for analyzing data of public company financial statements which may help user to simplify and to classify the data base on their need. The aplication was developed by using extreme programming which allows rapid development process and be able to adapt in evironment or technical varible change that occur during the development process. The result of the research was an application that can visualize financial statement data which supported by filter feature to help user clasify data base on their need. It could be concluded that data visualization application for analyzing public company's financial statement help user to understand the data and help user to clasify the data base on their need. © 2015 The Authors. Published by Elsevier B.V.
Author Keywords: Application; Financial Statement; Public Company; Visualization
Index Keywords: Applications; Artificial intelligence; Finance; Flow visualization; Visualization; Development process; EXtreme Programming; Financial statements; Public company; Visualization application; Data visualization
